resources.string: " Allow notifications for CopyBand in bracelet settings via Mi Fit"

Do you want to remember something, but the phone is about to be discharged, or do you want to carry it with you? I have great news for you! You have a Mi Band, and you can send text to it using this application. Just enter it in the input field and click send. Magic happens and you see this text on your bracelet.
To prevent text loss due to other notifications, turn off Bluetooth. It will be disconnected after 30 seconds.
It seems that you do not have the Mi Fit application installed. Want to install it?
Bluetooth is off. Turn on Bluetooth and check the connection with the bracelet.
